beforeStages.name: Navigate to the New Item Page.

steps.name: Go to the New Item Page by clicking New Item button.
Navigate to "NewItemPage"
Create new folder: "'Test_Folder'"
Go to the main page by clicking logo.
Navigate to "MainPage"
Go to the folder page: "'Test_Folder'"
Navigate to "FolderPage"
Click on "Create a job" inside the folder
Navigate to "NewItemPage"
Create new Pipeline project: "'Pipeline_one'"
Go to the main page by clicking logo.
Navigate to "MainPage"
Go to the folder page: "'Test_Folder'"
Navigate to "FolderPage"
Get list of items from folder
Verify that the new item was created inside the folder
